original_text: And he said, “The Jews have agreed to ask you to bring Paul down to the council tomorrow, as though they were going to inquire somewhat more closely about him.
korean_text: 대답하되 유대인들이 공모하기를 그들이 바울에 대하여 더 자세한 것을 묻기 위함이라 하고 내일 그를 데리고 공회로 내려오기를 당신께 청하자 하였으니

sentences.original_text: “The Jews have agreed to ask you
to bring Paul down to the council tomorrow,
as though they were going to inquire
